channel.title: Torrance on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Torrance on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Ramen Hayatemaru
item.description: Having lived in Los Angeles the last 5 years including the South Bay/Gardena/Torrance areas, I’ve always sought after my personal BEST ramen place. The best ramen place to me must have a tasty well balanced broth and good tasting thick noodles. Per recommendations, I checked out Ramen Hayatemaru in Torrance partly because they have half bowl sizes, so you can try more than 1 flavor. I typically like my ramen noodles thicker because I like to slurp (excuse my manners) my noodles like Naruto.
